trans-unit.source: Manages all the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
The InputManager class is responsible for coordinating all of the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Inputmanager 集結類別負責協調所有輸入中的系統[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件是接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput></xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>任何程式碼

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: 篩選可以修改輸入的暫存區域。

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.
trans-unit.target: 監視器就會接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput></xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>任何程式碼

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: 監視器無法修改輸入的暫存區域。

trans-unit.source: The InputManager controls the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Inputmanager 集結控制輸入的暫存區域。

trans-unit.source: The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的臨時區域處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]事件。

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
Post-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref> associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>與目前執行緒相關聯。

trans-unit.source: This class will not be available in Internet zone.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別在網際網路區域中將無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The input manager.
Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode*> method.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項進入功能表模式，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode*>

trans-unit.source: Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control entering the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: 元件會與這個事件來回應輸入輸入的管理員功能表模式的控制項註冊的委派。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.
trans-unit.target: 點擊測試的結果可能已變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets a collection of InputProviders registered with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的 InputProviders 向<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The collection of input provides.
Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref> is in menu mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否此<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref>處於功能表模式。

trans-unit.source: The IsInMenuMode property returns `true` if any menus are open, and it returns `false` if no menus are open.
trans-unit.target: IsInMenuMode 屬性會傳回`true`若任何功能表未開啟，而它會傳回`false`如果有任何功能表開啟。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref> is in menu mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref>處於功能表模式; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode*> method.
trans-unit.target: 當控制離開功能表模式，藉由呼叫時，就會發生<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode*>

trans-unit.source: Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control leaving the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: 元件會與此事件以回應離開輸入的管理員功能表模式的控制項註冊的委派。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets a value that represents the input device associated with the most recent input event.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示最新的輸入事件相關聯的輸入的裝置。

trans-unit.source: The input device.
Called by components to leave menu mode.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫離開功能表模式的元件。

trans-unit.source: A component calls this method to leave the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: 元件會呼叫這個方法，以保留輸入的管理員功能表模式。

trans-unit.source: The `menuSite` releases privileged access to window messages.
trans-unit.target: `menuSite`釋出的特殊的存取權的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to decrement and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> property to `false`, if this is the last menu to close.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會導致內部開啟功能表，以遞減的計數，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>屬性`false`，如果這是要關閉的最後一個功能表。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The menu to leave.
menuSite is .

Occurs after the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"></xref> handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events have been raised.
trans-unit.target: 之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"></xref>處理常式已完成處理的輸入和對應[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]已經引發事件。

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or PostNotifyInput.
trans-unit.target: 監視器就會接聽任何程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>或 PostNotifyInput。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: 監視器無法修改輸入的暫存區域。

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to PostNotifyInput are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: 附加至 PostNotifyInput 的處理常式會使使用者所加入的處理常式叫用處理常式之前在系統中以相反順序叫用。

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
Post-notify stage.
The input manager raises the PostNotifyInput event.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的管理員引發 PostNotifyInput 事件。

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
To be added.
Occurs after the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"></xref> handlers have finished processing the input.
trans-unit.target: 之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"></xref>處理常式已完成處理輸入。

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or PostProcessInput.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件是接聽的任何程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>或 PostProcessInput。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: 篩選可以修改輸入的暫存區域。

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to PostProcessInput are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: 附加至 PostProcessInput 的處理常式會使使用者所加入的處理常式叫用處理常式之前在系統中以相反順序叫用。

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
Post-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the PostProcessInput event.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的管理員引發 PostProcessInput 事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput"></xref> handlers have finished processing the input, if the input was not canceled.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput"></xref>處理常式完成處理輸入、 輸入不取消。

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to PreNotifyInput or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.
trans-unit.target: 監視器就會接聽 PreNotifyInput 或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>任何程式碼

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: 監視器無法修改輸入的暫存區域。

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to PreNotifyInput are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: 附加至 PreNotifyInput 的處理常式會使使用者所加入的處理常式叫用處理常式之前在系統中以相反順序叫用。

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the PreNotifyInput event.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的管理員引發 PreNotifyInput 事件。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
Post-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref> starts to process the input item.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>開始處理輸入的項目。

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to PreProcessInput or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件是 PreProcessInput 或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>接聽的任何程式碼

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: 篩選可以修改輸入的暫存區域。

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to PreProcessInput are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: 附加至 PreProcessInput 的處理常式會使使用者所加入的處理常式叫用處理常式之前在系統中以相反順序叫用。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler> will cancel the processing of the input.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs>傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler>將會取消處理輸入。</xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the PreProcessInput event.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的管理員引發 PreProcessInput 事件。

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
Post-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
To be added.
Gets the primary keyboard device.
The keyboard device.
Gets the primary mouse device.
The mouse device.
Processes the specified input synchronously.
A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件是接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput></xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>任何程式碼

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: 篩選可以修改輸入的暫存區域。

trans-unit.target: 監視器就會接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput></xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>任何程式碼

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: 監視器無法修改輸入的暫存區域。

trans-unit.source: The specified input is processed by all the filters and monitors and is finally dispatched to the appropriate element as an input event.
trans-unit.target: 指定的輸入處理的所有篩選器和監視，最後會分派至適當的項目，做為輸入的事件。

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
Post-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
The input to process.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all input events were handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已處理所有輸入的事件。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: input is .
Called by components to enter menu mode.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫進入功能表模式的元件。

trans-unit.source: A component calls this method to enter the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: 元件會呼叫此方法來進入輸入的管理員功能表模式。

trans-unit.source: The `menuSite` gets privileged access to window messages.
trans-unit.target: `menuSite`取得權限的存取權的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to increment and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> property to `true`, if this is the first menu to open.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會導致遞增的開啟功能表內部計數並設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>屬性`true`，如果這是要開啟的第一個功能表。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The menu to enter.
menuSite is .
